nodes.text: Shimiese was the native language of the Pacithhip species from Shimia.
Shimiese was a language of snorts, trumpets and intricate vocalizations, adequate to a Pacithhip's vocal structure.
Shimiese had a written form which used pictograms.
Most Pacithhips were fluent in both Shimiese and Basic, although they were only literate in their own language.
